lead_paragraph: Liam Messam will be given the opportunity to shake off his disappointment on missing selection for New Zealand's Olympics sevens team after being named on the Waikato Chiefs bench for Friday's Super Rugby clash against the Queensland Reds.

headline.print_headline: Messam to Shake Off Olympic Disappointment on Chiefs Bench
headline.main: Messam to Shake Off Olympic Disappointment on Chiefs Bench

snippet: Liam Messam will be given the opportunity to shake off his disappointment on missing selection for New Zealand's Olympics sevens team after being named on the Waikato Chiefs bench for Friday's Super Rugby clash against the Queensland Reds....
